summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4295 for the improvement of 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 80th Street to East 82nd Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50998, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
